Wisdom: الْخُضُوعُ دَنَاءَةٌ
enWisdom: Humility means servility [in front of Allah]

Wisdom: مَنْ خَضَعَ لِعَظَمَةِ اللَّهِ ذَلَّتْ لَهُ الرِّقَابُ
enWisdom: Whoever is humble in front of the majesty of Allah, people become submissive to him

Wisdom: نِعْمَ الطَّاعَةُ الِانْقِيَادُ وَالْخُضُوعُ
enWisdom: The best form of obedience is submission and humility

Wisdom: لَا عِبَادَةَ كَالْخُضُوعِ [كَالْخُشُوعِ‏]
enWisdom: There is no worship like [that which is accompanied by] humility

Wisdom: انْصُرِ اللَّهَ بِقَلْبِكَ وَلِسَانِكَ وَيَدِكَ فَإِنَّ اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ قَدْ تَكَفَّلَ بِنُصْرَةِ مَنْ يَنْصُرُهُ
enWisdom: Assist Allah with your heart, your tongue and your hand, for indeed Allah, the Glorified, has guaranteed assistance to one who assists Him

Wisdom: اجْعَلْ شَكْوَاكَ إِلَى مَنْ يَقْدِرُ عَلَى غِنَاكَ
enWisdom: Address your complaints to one who is capable of sufficing you

Wisdom: أَقْبَحُ الظُّلْمِ مَنْعُكَ حُقُوقَ اللَّهِ
enWisdom: The most loathsome injustice is your withholding the rights of Allah

Wisdom: إِنِ اسْتَطَعْتَ أَنْ لَا يَكُونَ بَيْنَكَ وَبَيْنَ اللَّهِ ذُو نِعْمَةٍ فَافْعَلْ
enWisdom: If you are able to ensure that there is no [other] benefactor between you and Allah then do so

Wisdom: إِذَا أَكْرَمَ اللَّهُ عَبْداً شَغَلَهُ [أَشْغَلَهُ‏] بِمَحَبَّتِهِ
enWisdom: When Allah honours a servant, He occupies him with His love

Wisdom: إِذَا ضَلَلْتَ عَنْ حِكْمَةِ اللَّهِ فَقِفْ عِنْدَ قُدْرَتِهِ فَإِنَّهُ إِنْ فَاتَكَ مِنْ حِكْمَتِهِ مَا يَشْفِيكَ فَلَنْ يَفُوتَكَ مِنْ قُدْرَتِهِ مَا يَكْفِيكَ
enWisdom: When you get lost from the wisdom of Allah then stand with His power, for indeed [even] if you do not get of His wisdom that which can heal you, you will not lose of His power that which will suffice you

Wisdom: تَحَبَّبْ إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ بِالرَّغْبَةِ فِيمَا لَدَيْهِ
enWisdom: Seek the love of Allah, the Glorified, by desiring that which is with Him

Wisdom: حُسْنُ ظَنِّ الْعَبْدِ بِاللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ عَلَى قَدْرِ رَجَائِهِ لَهُ
enWisdom: The positive thinking of a servant about Allah, the Glorified, is to the extent of his hope in Him

Wisdom: رُبَّ مَمْلُوكٍ لَا يُسْتَطَاعُ فِرَاقُهُ
enWisdom: Many a slave is such that one cannot bear his separation

Wisdom: كُلُّ طَالِبٍ غَيْرُ اللَّهِ مَطْلُوبٌ
enWisdom: Every seeker other than Allah is sought

Wisdom: كَيْفَ يَنْجُو مِنَ اللَّهِ هَارِبُهُ
enWisdom: How can one who flees from Allah be saved?!

Wisdom: لَنْ تَتَّصِلَ بِالْخَالِقِ حَتَّى تَنْقَطِعَ عَنِ الْخَلْقِ
enWisdom: You will never get connected to the Creator until you sever your ties with the creation

Wisdom: لَمْ يُدْرِكِ الْمَجْدَ مَنْ عَدَاهُ الْحَمْدُ
enWisdom: He who has been forgone by praise does not attain distinction

Wisdom: لَوْ حَفِظْتُمْ حُدُودَ اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ لَعَجَّلَ لَكُمْ مِنْ فَضْلِهِ الْمَوْعُودِ
enWisdom: If you were to preserve the bounds of Allah, the Glorified, He would hasten for you His promised bounty

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَعَانَ بِاللَّهِ أَعَانَهُ
enWisdom: One who seeks assistance from Allah is assisted by Him

Wisdom: مَنْ أَمِنَ مَكْرَ اللَّهِ بَطَلَ أَمَانُهُ [إِيمَانُهُ‏]
enWisdom: One who feels secure from the scheme of Allah, his sense of security is futile (or his faith is nullified)

Wisdom: مَنْ خَادَعَ اللَّهَ خُدِعَ
enWisdom: One who tries to deceive Allah is [himself] deceived

Wisdom: مَنْ كَتَمَ وَجَعاً أَصَابَهُ ثَلَاثَةَ أَيَّامٍ وَشَكَا إِلَى اللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ كَانَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ مُعَافِيَهُ [كَانَ حَقّاً عَلَى اللَّهِ أَنْ يُعَافِيَهُ‏]
enWisdom: Whoever hides a pain that has afflicted him for three days and complains of it [only] to Allah, the Glorified, then Allah will be the one who restores his good health

Wisdom: مَنِ اسْتَظْهَرَ بِاللَّهِ أَعْجَزَ قَهْرَهُ
enWisdom: One who has the backing of Allah [and trusts in Him], his subjugation [by the enemy] becomes impossible

Wisdom: مَنْ يَكُنِ اللَّهُ خَصْمَهُ يُدْحِضْ حُجَّتَهُ وَيَكُنْ لَهُ حَرْباً
enWisdom: One whose enemy is Allah, his proof is refuted and Allah wages war with him

Wisdom: مَنْ يَكُنِ اللَّهُ نَصِيرَهُ يَغْلِبْ خَصْمَهُ وَيَكُنْ لَهُ حِزْباً
enWisdom: One whose helper is Allah gains victory over his enemy and gains [in Him] the support [like that] of a [large] group

Wisdom: وَقِّرُوا اللَّهَ سُبْحَانَهُ وَاجْتَنِبُوا مَحَارِمَهُ وَأَحِبُّوا أَحِبَّاءَهُ
enWisdom: Revere Allah the Glorified, keep away from what He has forbidden and love those whom He loves

Wisdom: لَا يَحْمَدُ حَامِدٌ إِلَّا رَبَّهُ
enWisdom: A Praiser should praise none but his Lord

Wisdom: لَا يُحْسِنُ عَبْدٌ الظَّنَّ بِاللَّهِ سُبْحَانَهُ إِلَّا كَانَ اللَّهُ سُبْحَانَهُ عِنْدَ حُسْنِ ظَنِّهِ بِهِ
enWisdom: A servant does not think positively of Allah, the Glorified, but that Allah, the Glorified, is just as his positive thoughts are of Him
